	hashblock	IOblock		store(ms)	load(ms)	
11M:	8*1024		16*1024*1024	49161		245
11M:	8*1024		8*1024*1024	23169		205
11M:	8*1024		4*1024*1024	22472		218

11M:	4*1024		16*1024*1024	41639		200
11M:	4*1024		8*1024*1024	42362		222
11M:	4*1024		4*1024*1024	38163		222

from new db:
	hashblock	IOblock		store(ms)	load(ms)	dbfile(MB)	hashes#
11M:	8*1024		16*1024*1024	49161		245
11M:	8*1024		8*1024*1024	24639		232
11M:	8*1024		4*1024*1024	19443		204		10.3
10M:	8*1024		4*1024*1024	15931		184		10.3		1296

add 'abcd' at the beginning of the file:
	hashblock	IOblock		store(ms)	load(ms)	dbfile(MB)
11M:	8*1024		4*1024*1024	40115		273		17.2		
10M:	8*1024		4*1024*1024	36866		207		17.2		2163
